Entries.Susan: This looks delicious! Thank you!/230 211 220 221 223 222 608 233 234 611 612/Oh, goodness! For me? Thank you./60 709 336 335 334 339 373 74 446/That's very kind of you. Thanks./346 459 303/This isn't something I like.../167 226 283/That's generous of you./348 350 395/

BeforeMovie.Text: This movie is about a sapling. How cute.$0

DuringMovie.Text: Aww. The sappling is so adorable!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me out, @. I want to go home and water my little babies.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: Brr... It's freezing. I'm glad the building is warm.$0

AfterMovie.Text: The film felt very authentic, with the story and special effects.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I hope there are still seats left.$0

AfterMovie.Text: I enjoyed the movie. Did anything stand out to you?$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I haven't seen this genre in forever. I'm anxious to see it!$0

AfterMovie.Text: I wonder if this film will come out on VHS soon! I'll get it!$0

BeforeMovie.Text: It isn't my favorite genra, but I'll give it a go.$0

Entries.Susan: Jas and Vincent are so excited to hunt for the eggs around town. I hope they find lots of them!$1#$e#I'm thinking about getting a second helping of ham and veggies.$4
What a beatufiul day for the Flower Festival.$4#$e#Are you planning on dancing with someone?$1
It's nice to have the governor in the valley. Mayor Lewis worked so hard to make the Luau perfect.$0#$e#I wonder if that slow roast ham Linus is making is almost ready.$1
I'm awfully afraid of large bodies of water. I'll be here on the beach, where it's safe.$0
I'm happy I get to showcase my best produce and artisan goods to everyone.$4#$b#Emerald Farm had a strong year!$1
So these are shadow brutes? They look menacing...$2
When I was younger, my father and I loved to fish together. Haven't fished at all since then.$0#$b#I think you'll do great in the contest, @.$1#$e#Best of luck to you, honey!$4
He loved the gift I gave him! I knew he'd appreciate it.$1

I should come back tomorrow."/end position 10 19

Entries.1000077/j 30: kindadumbautumn/-200 -200/farmer 2 2 2 Susan 3 3 0/skippable/pause 1500/speak Susan "Hello! I'm Susan, the owner of Emerald Farm up at the railroad.$1#$b#I've been trapped up there alone ever since Joja caused the rockslide, so I've got a little bit of cabin fever.$0#$b#I'm happy to finally meet you, @.$4"/pause 1000/faceDirection Susan 1 true/pause 800/faceDirection Susan 0/pause 600/speak Susan "I'm taking a small business trip to Grampleton this morning. I'll be gone all day.$0#$b#Stop by and visit Emerald Farm tomorrow when you have the time!$1"/pause 350/end

Entries.1000078/f Susan 500/t 600 1150/z winter/: breezy/-500 -500/farmer 34 54 1 Susan 45 52 2 MarlonFay 15 20 2 Wizard 15 22 0/pause 500/skippable/viewport 35 51 true/viewport move 1 0 6100 true/move farmer 4 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 900/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Susan "@! Hello!$1#$b#I'm refreshing my little guys with patented homemade fertilizer.$0#$b#Nitrogen, potassium, and phosphorous are part of what makes Emerald Farm's produce delicous.$4#$b#Just add sunshine, water, and some love, and you've got yourself a profitable season!$1"/pause 900/move Susan -2 0 3/pause 1200/move Susan 0 0 0/pause 1000/speak Susan "Emerald Farm is small in comparison to %farm Farm. I can't imagine managing that much space.$0"/pause 100/question fork0 "How are you able to keep up with all of that land?#Honestly, it's because I never take breaks.#I automate watering with sprinklers."/fork 1000078_NoBreaks/pause 500/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 350/speak Susan "Oh! I've tried crafting some sprinklers, but I can't seem to get the plumbing just right.$0#$b#I'm amazed you can craft such sophisticated devices.$4"/pause 700/speak Susan "With how many acres %farm Farm covers, if you want to use all that space, automation's probably a must.$1#$b#I don't think it'd be possible for one person to maintain, unless you hired a few farmhands to help.$0#$b#Most farmers near Pelican Town are small enough to be self-sufficient, but the orchards in Chestervale bring on seasonal help for the harvest.$1"/pause 1000/move Susan 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Susan "I need to finish fertilizing before the afternoon heat hits. Talk to you soon!$1"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "Susan was in a cheerful mood today!"/end dialogue Susan "Thank you for visiting me earlier, @.$1#$e#The way you handle running a farm that big makes me feel motivated to chase bigger dreams.$4#$e#Have a nice day, dear!$1"
Entries.1000078_NoBreaks: pause 500/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 700/speak Susan "I've noticed you work through every weekend, and sometimes don't head into town for days. Don't push yourself too hard, honey.$2#$b#Taking a day or two off won't be the end of the world.$0"/pause 1200/speak Susan "Maybe we can take a trip to Grampleton sometime? I'd love to introduce you to my crafting instructor.$1"/pause 1000/move Susan 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Susan "I need to finish fertilizing before the afternoon heat hits. Talk to you soon!$1"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "Susan was in a cheerful mood today!"/end dialogue Susan "Thank you for visiting me earlier, @!$1#$b#My crafting instructor's name is Charlotte. She's an accomplished woodworker. You should meet her sometime!$0"

Entries.1000079/f Susan 1000/t 800 1500/z spring: kindadumbautumn/-500 -500/farmer 38 51 1 Susan 54 50 0/pause 500/skippable/viewport 39 50 true/viewport move 1 0 9250 true/move farmer 9 0 1/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 500/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 200/emote Susan 16/pause 150/speak Susan "Hey there, @.$1#$b#I'm grateful you took time out of your day to visit me!$4"/pause 700/speak Susan "I'm harvesting my grapes. I use hand-crafted kegs to age them into wine.$0#$b#Right now I only brew small batches, but maybe Emerald Farm will become a full-fledged winery like Blue Moon Vineyard. Lots of money in wine!$1"/pause 500/question fork1 "#I'm positive Emerald Farm will do great.#What can you tell me about the cave up there?"/fork 1000079_WitchCave/pause 600/speak Susan "Aww. Thank you, sweetie.$0#$b#I've lived in Stardew Valley for a long time. Emerald Farm has grown so much in my time here!$1#$b#Seeing how much progress you've made on %farm Farm inspires me to work even harder!$4"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 200/emote Susan 32/pause 100/speak Susan "I'm thrilled there's another farmer in the valley.$1"/pause 1100/move Susan 0 0 0/pause 1300/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 700/speak Susan "I need to finish harvesting these grapes, then off to the kegs they go!$1#$b#Have a splendid day, @.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end dialogue Susan "I finished harvesting my grapes!$1#$b#Now they'll ferment in the kegs for a month. I like to make sure every part of the process is high-quality, so I even started culturing my own yeast for fermenting!$0"
Entries.1000079_WitchCave: pause 200/stopMusic/pause 300/emote Susan 8/pause 500/speak Susan "A cave by the railroad station? Honey, I've lived here for a long time. I assure you there's no cave.$2"/pause 400/emote farmer 40/pause 150/speak Susan "You want to show me? Be my guest. I'm actually very curious about this 'cave'...$0"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Susan 54 38/warp farmer 53 39/faceDirection Susan 0/faceDirection farmer 0/viewport 48 38 true/pause 600/emote Susan 8/pause 300/speak Susan "@, there isn't a cave here. Just a wall of solid rock.$2#$b#Is everything okay? Have you been eating enough? You work yourself far too hard, dear.$2"/pause 800/faceDirection Susan 3/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 600/speak Susan "I'm going to get back to harvesting my grapes.$0#$b#I have a wine shipment due next month, so I have to get them into the kegs pretty soon.$0"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/pause 1000/message "Susan can't see the cave. You wonder: who else can?"/pause 700/end position 54 38

Entries.1000080/f Susan 1500/z spring/z summer/z: kindadumbautumn/-500 -500/farmer 30 56 0 Susan 30 46 2/viewport 30 50 true/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/move Susan 0 4 2 true/pause 2000/speak Susan "Hello, @. Perfect timing!$1#$b#I just got back from Grampleton. During winter, the snow blankets the meadows there, and everything is beautiful and still.$1#$b#Every year, I try to get out there to see it at least once after the first snowfall.$4"/pause 850/speak Susan "I have a few close friends in Grampleton. We have crafting circles where we all get together and work on our projects.$1#$b#This time, I made some lovely hardwood flower pots!$1"/pause 400/emote Susan 40/pause 200/speak Susan "It's pretty chilly out here, @. Would you like to come inside? I'll make you a cup of hot cocoa.$0"/pause 500/question fork0 "#I'd love some hot cocoa.#I don't like hot chocolate."/fork 1000080_SusanHouse/pause 750/speak Susan "No worries, honey. Stay bundled up in this cold!$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end position 30 52
Entries.1000080_SusanHouse: pause 550/speak Susan "Let's get inside, @!$4"/pause 150/emote farmer 32 true/pause 200/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/changeLocation SusanHouse/pause 300/warp farmer 24 15/warp Susan 26 15/pause 100/move farmer 0 0 1/move Susan 0 0 0/pause 800/playMusic 50s/pause 500/viewport 17 14 true/pause 900/playSound Milking/shake Susan 600/pause 1000/speak Susan "Here you are, sweetie.$0#$b#Be careful, it's a little hot.$1"/pause 400/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 500/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 600/showFrame farmer 90/playSound pickUpItem/pause 500/showFrame farmer 91/pause 150/showFrame farmer 92/pause 150/showFrame farmer 93/pause 100/playSound gulp/pause 750/playSound gulp/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 500/showFrame farmer 92/pause 150/showFrame farmer 91/pause 150/showFrame farmer 90/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 300/playSound stoneStep/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/emote farmer 32/emote Susan 16/speak Susan "Well, that must be a record. Never before have I seen someone drink hot cocoa so quickly.$1#$b#You must have been freezing!$1"/pause 1200/speak Susan "Oh! I was going to tell you more about my trip.$4"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/stopMusic/pause 600/message "The hot cocoa was delicious! Susan told me about her friends in Grampleton. She also showed me a chest she's crafting and knicknacks from many places she's visited across the world."/pause 800/friendship Susan 50/end dialogue Susan "Stop by again for more hot cocoa!$1"

Entries.1000081/f Susan 2000/w sunny/z winter/t: spaceMusic/-500 -500/farmer 12 20 1 Susan 46 20 3 Linus 46 10 0/pause 750/move farmer 16 0 1 true/move Susan -16 0 3 true/skippable/viewport 29 28 true/viewport move 0 -1 9000 true/pause 5500/emote Susan 16 true/pause 2000/speak Susan "Good evening, @. Didn't expect to see anyone on my way home.$0#$b#I'm on my way back from Grampleton. My crafting instructor, Charlotte, was teaching me how to build seed makers. They could save me a lot of money on seeds!$1#$b#Getting to Grampleton on foot takes around four hours. I usually take the train, but I wanted some fresh air, and the fields around here are beautiful.$4"/pause 1200/speak Susan "Say, where did you learn to craft? I've been crafting for a long time, and I know talent when I see it.$1"/pause 200/question fork0 "Did you study with books or have an instructor?#I've been learning on my own.#I read some books."/fork 1000081_CantExplain/pause 500/speak Susan "Books? Like crafting manuals?$0#$b#That's where I started too. A few years ago, I felt like I'd learned everything books had to teach me, so I found an instructor in Grampleton.$1#$b#Charlotte and I have grown pretty close since then.$4"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 250/emote Susan 32/pause 500/speak Susan "We're both excellent at woodworking, but in different ways. We learn a lot from each other.$1"/pause 1200/textAboveHead Susan "*yawn*"/shake Susan 800/pause 1050/speak Susan "Walking all day really wears you out. I'm going to head home and hit the hay.$2#$b#See you soon, @.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end position 28 20
Entries.1000081_CantExplain: pause 500/emote Susan 16 true/pause 300/speak Susan "You taught yourself to craft like that without any help!?$1#$b#You're gifted, @.$4"/pause 800/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Susan "Maybe we can chat more about crafting later. I'd love to study your technique!$1"/pause 1200/textAboveHead Susan "*yawn*"/shake Susan 800/pause 1050/speak Susan "Walking all day really wears you out. I'm going to head home and hit the hay.$2#$b#See you soon, @.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end position 28 20
